New website

20 Apr 2018

The mental vision for my new personal site is slowly taking shape. I'm going to try and embrace minimalism as much as possible, almost all black and white, a lot of lower case letters, some cool typography, vast amounts of negative space. If I can make it a reality, it's gonna look sick.
